_comments.AutoCADPath: Path to accoreconsole.exe (change for different AutoCAD versions)
_comments.DllsToLoad: List of DLLs to load in AutoCAD (full paths, in order)
_comments.AvailableCommands: List of commands to choose from at runtime (shown in interactive menu)
_comments.MainCommand: Default AutoCAD command (used if no selection made)
_comments.MaxParallelProcesses: Number of drawings to process simultaneously
_comments.TempScriptFolder: Folder for temporary script files (empty = system temp)
